references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of deep reinforcement learning, introducing a technique that significantly improves the efficiency of training RL agents by addressing the issue of reward sparsity.

references.paper_title: Playing Atari with deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This highly influential work demonstrated the power of deep neural networks in reinforcement learning, setting the stage for many subsequent advancements and significantly impacting the field.

references.paper_title: Human-level control through deep reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper showcased the ability of deep reinforcement learning agents to achieve human-level performance in a challenging game environment, marking a major milestone in the field and inspiring extensive further research.
This work introduces the concept bottleneck model, which provides a crucial foundation for the interpretable concept bottleneck agents presented in the main paper.

This paper introduces the Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithm, a widely used and highly effective method for training reinforcement learning agents that is employed as the training algorithm in the experiments presented in the main paper.
